about.title: About PASA
about.subtitle: We are focused on building and delivering LLM technology.
body: PASA is an AI company dedicated to advancing Large Language Models and turning research into practical products.
Our current focus is PASA AI, a capable assistant designed for individuals and teams. Next up: PASA Cloud, PASA Account, PASA Labs, and PASA Research.
We care about performance, accessibility, and responsible technology that respects people.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
We collect only what is necessary to operate our services. We do not sell personal data. You control your information and may request deletion at any time.

Authentication and basic profile data are stored securely. Analytics are optional and require cookie consent.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content:
By using this site, you agree to act lawfully and respect intellectual property. Services are provided as-is without warranties. Liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.

We may update these terms with reasonable notice.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.content:
We use strictly necessary cookies for site functionality and an optional consent cookie to enable analytics. Without consent, analytics are disabled.

You can change your preferences anytime.
